briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety Study of GK530G Versus CD0271 0.1% Gel and CD1579 2.5% Gel in the Treatment of Acne Vulgaris.
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blinded, Active-controlled Parallel Group Efficacy and Safety Study of GK530G Versus CD0271 0.1% Gel and CD1579 2.5% Gel in the Treatment of Acne Vulgaris.

interventions.name: GK530G
otherNames: Fixed-dose combination gel of Adapalene and Benzoyl Peroxide

summary: This study is to demonstrate the superiority in efficacy of the GK530G (fixed combination of CD0271 0.1% and CD1579 2.5%) versus each of the monads (CD0271 0.1% and CD1579 2.5%) in the treatment of acne vulgaris for up to 12 weeks, in the Japanese patients.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percent Changes From Baseline in Total Lesion Counts
